configuration.sarif-viewer.rootpaths.des: Add root paths for default mapping of locations in the sarif file that can't be found (ex. the local root directory of your repo)
configuration.sarif-viewer.resultsListHi: The list of columns to hide from the results list
configuration.sarif-viewer.resultsListGr: The column to group the results list by
configuration.sarif-viewer.resultsListSo: The column to sort the results list by(per group) and the order

explorer.Title: SARIF Explorer
openRemappingInputDialog.title: Sarif Result Location Remapping
openRemappingInputDialog.prompt: Valid path, confirm if it maps to '{0}' or its rootpath
openRemappingInputDialog.validationMessa:
'{0}' can not be found.
Correct the path to: the local file (c:/example/repo1/source.js) for this session or the local rootpath (c:/example/repo1/) to add it to the user settings (Press 'Escape' to cancel)
openRemappingInputDialog.alreadyExistsIn: '{0}' already exists in the settings (sarif-viewer.rootpaths), please try a different path (Press 'Escape' to cancel)

diagnosticCollection.limitingResults: Only displaying {0} of the total {1} results in the SARIF log.
Indicates whether to open the explorer when there are no results in the log.
sarif-viewer.binaryArtifactContent.bytes: When rendering binary artifact content, determines the number of bytes displayed in a row.
sarif-viewer.binaryArtifactContent.viewA: When enabled, renders binary artifact content as markdown.
sarif-viewer.openMarkdownPreview.descrip: When viewing artifact content containing markdown, show the markdown preview.
sarif-viewer.logUpgrade.prompt.descripti: Determines how files are created when a SARIF log needs to be upgraded from an earlier schema.
sarif-viewer.logUpgrade.prompt.temporary: A temporary file  for the upgraded SARIF log is created, no prompt is shown.
sarif-viewer.updateChannel.description: Specifies the type of updates the extension receives.
sarif-viewer.updateChannel.insiders.desc: Insiders channel. Receives upcoming features and bug fixes at a faster rate.
